/* 로그인, userMapper_SQL.signInUser */ SELECT TU.SEQ , TU.EMAIL , TU.password , TU.NAME , TU.NICKNAME , TU.TEL , TU.PHOTO_URL , TU.IDNTF_CD , TO_CHAR(TU.CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATED_AT , BP.IDNTF_NM FROM TB_USER TU JOIN BASE_PERMISSION BP ON TU.IDNTF_CD = BP.IDNTF_CD WHERE TU.EMAIL = #{email} AND TU.password = #{password}
